title: 我擦 MC1.8可能会被延后
author: vazz
txt_content:
刚去官方论坛看了眼。。。说有可能延迟到8日之后更新1.8

jeb最近发言  
1.8有可能不在9月8日发布，为了方便彻底测试和保证质量，我需要更多时间。不过，至少有一个值得期待的发布日期 - 虽然它可能不是8日，但它不会拖延太久。 

以下是原文
that 1.8 will most likely not be released on September 8th, to allow time for more thorough testing and quality assurance. 
Still, there seems to be a careful optimism regarding the release date - while it may not be on the 8th, it will still likely be in the near future.
